contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Just about the most comfortable shorts you'll ever find. Our performance shorts are made from our ultra-soft Flowknit material. With a bit of stretch, they're designed to move with you - whether you're on a run or just getting up from the couch.
contentfulProduct.title: Flowknit Ultra-Soft Performance Short

content.value: Buy any 3 activewear, downwear, cashmere or socks items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

Just about the most comfortable shorts you'll ever find. Our performance shorts are made from our ultra-soft Flowknit material. With a bit of stretch, they're designed to move with you - whether you're on a run or just getting up from the couch.
Quick Dry, Moisture Wicking, Anti-microbial, 4-way stretch
Cell-phone pocket at front, secure zip back pocket
Recycled yarn is certified by GRS (Global Recycle Standard)
Recycled polyester dramatically lowers its environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
Dyeing, washing, and manufacturing processes are certified under RCS (Recycled Claim Standard) and made with low-water, eco friendly dyes
Produced in Sedex certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
Model is 6'2" and wearing a size Medium
Machine wash on cold gentle cycle with like colors. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Do not iron or dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 88% Recycled Polyester, 12% Spandex
  • Inseam: 7.5" inseam hits mid-thigh
  • Quick Dry, Moisture Wicking, Anti-microbial, 4-way stretch
  • Cell-phone pocket at front, secure zip back pocket
  • Recycled yarn is certified by GRS (Global Recycle Standard)
  • Recycled polyester dramatically lowers its environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
  • Dyeing, washing, and manufacturing processes are certified under RCS (Recycled Claim Standard) and made with low-water, eco friendly dyes
  • Produced in Sedex certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
  • Origin: Zhangjiagang, China
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing a size Medium

productDescription.productDescription: Just about the most comfortable shorts you'll ever find. Our performance shorts are made from our ultra-soft Flowknit material. With a bit of stretch, they're designed to move with you - whether you're on a run or just getting up from the couch.

svgList.entryTitle: Moisture Wicking & Odor Fighting - Flow knit
Better for you & the planet - Flowknit

content.value: We partner with factories who have a commitment to responsible production. This means paying workers fairly and doing their best to produce in a way that reduces damage to the environment.

We're working hard to use sustainably produced materials that minimize our impact on the planet, such as organic cotton, responsibly sourced wool, and finishes that are free of harmful chemicals and toxins.
We believe in creating high quality, functional, and timeless essentials that will be used or worn for a long time, and won't end up in a landfill.

Thanks for your review.
Your comment will soon be 
visible online.

reviews.title: Simple perfect
reviews.author: Nataliya K.
reviews.body: This sweater is my favorite now!

reviewOptions.title: Runs small|Slightly small|True to size|Slightly large|Runs large|
Runs short|Slightly short|True to length|Slightly long|Runs long|
Expensive price|Slightly expensive|Moderate price|Good price|Unbeatable price|

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
